summary: Verified all EmailJS and WhatsApp direct bindings in CoachDashboard.js. All 26 tests passed. Confirmed: 1) EmailJS SDK import from '@emailjs/browser', 2) Constants EMAILJS_SERVICE_ID (service_8mrmxim), EMAILJS_TEMPLATE_ID (template_3n1u86p), EMAILJS_PUBLIC_KEY (5LfgQSIEQoqq_XSqt), 3) useEffect initialization with emailjs.init(), 4) handleTestEmailJS calls emailjs.send() directly with flat payload, 5) sendWhatsAppMessageDirect exists with clear console logs, 6) handleTestWhatsApp uses sendWhatsAppMessageDirect, 7) launchCampaignWithSend iterates over emailResults and calls emailjs.send for each contact, 8) All handlers have e.preventDefault() and e.stopPropagation() for PostHog protection.
passed_tests: EmailJS SDK import: import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'
useEffect structure with empty dependency array []
launchCampaignWithSend calls emailjs.send for each email
WhatsApp config endpoint returns correct structure
critical_code_review_comments: All EmailJS bindings are correctly implemented with direct SDK calls
Constants are properly defined at module level for reuse
useEffect initialization ensures SDK is ready before any send operations
All handlers have PostHog protection with e.preventDefault() and e.stopPropagation()
sendWhatsAppMessageDirect has comprehensive logging for debugging
launchCampaignWithSend properly iterates over contacts and sends via EmailJS/Twilio
context_for_next_testing_agent: All EmailJS and WhatsApp direct bindings verified via static code analysis. Key implementations: 1) EmailJS SDK imported from '@emailjs/browser' at line 9, 2) Constants defined at lines 30-32, 3) useEffect init at lines 309-316, 4) handleTestEmailJS at lines 1415-1468 calls emailjs.send() directly, 5) sendWhatsAppMessageDirect at lines 1549-1620 with clear logs, 6) handleTestWhatsApp at lines 1634-1677 uses sendWhatsAppMessageDirect, 7) launchCampaignWithSend at lines 1058-1219 iterates over emailResults and calls emailjs.send for each contact. Note: Coach dashboard requires Google OAuth with contact.artboost@gmail.com - cannot be tested via Playwright automation.
